title: One Piece Episode #572 Anime Review
author: Chris Beveridge
description: A detailed review of Episode 572 discussing the introduction of characters from Cake Island who want to challenge Luffy, and the transition from Fish-Man Island to the New World arc. The review analyzes the episode's pacing, character moments, and setup for future conflicts.

title: Episodes 571-572: She Loves Sweets! Big Mom of the Four Emperors! and Many Problems Lie Ahead! A Trap Awaiting in the New World!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A comprehensive recap and analysis of episodes 571-572, covering the introduction of Big Mom's crew, the Tamate Box situation, Pekoms' battle with Caribou, and Jinbe's decision to leave Big Mom. Written from the perspective of someone watching One Piece for the first time.

title: Analysis: One Piece - The Significance Of The Tamatebako
author: 12Dimension
description: An in-depth analysis of the Tamate Box plot device introduced in Episode 572 and its significance throughout the series. Examines Oda's long-term storytelling and how the bomb setup pays off hundreds of episodes later during the Whole Cake Island arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers through the Whole Cake Island arc

title: The One Piece Podcast - Episode 572 Recap
author: Stephen, Ed, and Zach
description: The One Piece Podcast discusses Episode 572 along with Volume 68 and Chapter 686. Features discussion of Pekoms' Devil Fruit reveal, the Tamate Box situation, and speculation about the upcoming Punk Hazard arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the anime through Episode 572 and manga through Chapter 686

title: Episode 572 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 572 including plot summary, character appearances, trivia, manga chapters covered, production credits, and episode notes.

title: Tamatebako - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Dedicated wiki page about the Tamate Box treasure, covering its history, contents, the bomb rigging, and its eventual fate during the Whole Cake Island arc. Provides context for the plot device introduced in Episode 572.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Whole Cake Island arc

title: One Piece: Fishman Island (517-574) - Episode 572
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of Episode 572 with subtitles. As the Straw Hats prepare to depart Fish-Man Island, a lion and a caribou come to blows over booby-trapped treasure, and Vice Admiral Smoker makes his presence felt in the New World.

title: Pekoms - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive character page for Pekoms, including his Devil Fruit abilities first revealed in Episode 572, his role in the Big Mom Pirates, and his character development throughout the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Whole Cake Island and beyond

title: Kame Kame no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Devil Fruit encyclopedia entry for the Kame Kame no Mi, first demonstrated in Episode 572. Details the fruit's abilities, user, strengths, and weaknesses.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information through Zou arc where the fruit name is revealed
